review: I had to get a 3 HDMI adaptor to connect my Roku because my tv only had one HDMI port. My problem is I cannot switch back and forth from cable to Roku using the remote(s). I have to physically remove the Roku cable to watch cable tv. I also have to use my tv speakers for the Roku instead of my stereo. This may be because of my own ignorance of the connection so if anyone has an answer for my dilemma, I would appreciate it.
